project_description:
Roof re-shingle 
Foundation
Kitchen Remodel 
2 Bathroom Remodels 
Addition of a shower to a half bath which includes framing to extend the bathroom
Remove one front window 
Move front Door over a few feet to make room for shower addition (NO HOMESTEAD EXEMPTION PER DCAD)
New Floors
Texture and Paint
reasoning: This is an LLC/investor lead on a mid-value property ($298k) with a complex, multi-trade scope. The absentee status combined with the below-average market value strongly suggests a landlord or flipper who will prioritize low cost over quality. The lead is 24 days old, which is borderline for urgent trades like roofing but still within the window for general renovation work.
ideal_contractor: A general contractor or a mid-tier, price-competitive roofer or foundation specialist. This is not a good fit for premium/luxury trades.
flags: LLC/Investor Owner|Absentee + Low Value = Landlord|Complex Multi-Trade Scope (hard to monetize quickly)|No Homestead Exemption (confirms investment property)
